name: 2DShooter (liteworld)
description:
2D Shooter Game (a space invasion game)

Credits: Ammar Al-Najjar

Additions:

  • Added extra levels, each with different difficulty level, and different background music
  • Added textual info screens (Instructions, Game Complete Thank You)
  • Added small asteroids as obstacles/routes to make the game more interesting and challenging. bullets can bounce over asteroids and enemies hide behind them, more fun!
